title: PUMA Men's Tazon 6 FM
description: Conquer your day with the excellent underfoot comfort of the Tazon 6 FM from PUMA®. Synthetic leather upper with perforations at toe and quarter. Padded collar and tongue for comfort. Lace-up closure for a snug and custom fit. T-toe construction. Midfoot saddle for optimum fit and comfort. Features a Soft Foam comfort insole for added cushioning and support. Features an EVA midsole and TPU shank for increased stability. Grippy rubber outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 13 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
